snippet.title: Lessons For Marketers From The Decade's Worst Super Bowl Ads
snippet.description: VideoThere’s always got to be one bozo at the party. The person who crosses the line, be it with tasteless jokes, less than tasteful clothing, or just moronic, “hey look at me” behavior. With the Super Bowl upon us, I thought about this nutcase-at-the-party scenario, and not just in terms [...] read »

snippet.title: Cops Use Traffic Stops To Seize Millions From Drivers Never Charged With A Crime
snippet.description: VideoLicense, registration—and your cash. A deputy for the Humboldt County’s Sheriff Office in rural Nevada has been accused of confiscating over $60,000 from drivers who were never charged with a crime. These cash seizures are now the subject of two federal lawsuits and are the latest to spotlight a little-known police [...] read »

snippet.title: Best New-Car Deals For June: Early Clearance Edition
snippet.description: Astute shoppers who may not place a high priority on driving the latest cars and trucks can find some unbeatable deals on models that are scheduled to be discontinued or redesigned at the end of the current model year.

snippet.title: New-Car Clunkers To Avoid
snippet.description: With so many worthy makes and models of new cars and trucks on the market these days, we had to look long and hard to quantify which just don’t make the grade.

snippet.title: New Cars To Avoid: Jeep Wrangler, Nissan Xterra And More
snippet.description: Today’s cars and trucks deliver far better performance and are more reliable than their predecessors, though some 2013 models remain tough choices in what’s become a highly competitive – and demanding – marketplace.
